arts.ttl: Man City firm up Florian Wirtz transfer interest as Leverkusen eye two players in exchange
arts.sum: Manchester City are targeting a summer transfer for Bayer Leverkusen star Florian Wirtz, and the Bundesliga side would like to take a couple of Pep Guardiola's players in exchange

arts.ttl: How 'exceptional' De Bruyne starred against Palace
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundits Micah Richards and Alan Shearer look at Kevin de Bruyne's exceptional performance against Crystal Palace.

arts.ttl: Man City seven figure bid for wonderkid who has played for both Scotland and England at youth level 'rejected'
arts.sum: 15-year-old Owls starlet Caelan-Kole Cadamarteri is said to have caught the eye of the Premier League champions

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne makes shock admission about his future after confirming he will leave Man City this summer
arts.sum: He rolled back the years on Saturday with a magnificent performance to inspire Pep Guardiola 's side to a 5-2 win over Crystal Palace - and then made an admission about his next move.

arts.ttl: De Bruyne: Playing without pain is like night and day
arts.sum: Kevin De Bruyne says he is finally playing without pain again after inspiring Manchester City to a 5-2 comeback victory over Crystal Palace on Saturday. But he sparked Man City's comeback from 2-0 down against Palace by scoring their first goal with a free-kick before setting up Mateo Kovacic to complete their turnaround.

arts.ttl: Phil Foden's grandmother speaks out after vile Manchester derby chants aimed at family
arts.sum: The Man City star could be seen reacting to the chants aimed at his mother

arts.ttl: Kevin De Bruyne could perform sensational U-turn and STAY at Man City, claims Joe Cole, after Belgian midfielder inspired comeback win over Crystal Palace
arts.sum: The midfielder rolled back the years with a magnificent performance as Pep Guardiola's side strengthened their Champions League hopes with a 5-2 win over Palace.

arts.ttl: Manchester City man being “represented terribly” – Journalist believes it’s money not career
arts.sum: Manchester City youngster Claudio Echeverri is being represented terribly, as he has to wait until June to get back to playing. That’s according to journalist Germán García Grova, whose comments on the Manchester City signing have been relayed by El Intransigente. arts.ttl: Manchester City climb into Premier League top four and Forest slip up at home
'No-one can do what Kevin has' - De Bruyne shines as Man City exit nears
arts.sum: Kevin de Bruyne has three more Manchester City games to play at Etihad Stadium - and three more opportunities for City fans to give him a standing ovation.
